CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Ensure_Operability__c , "Yes"),1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Impacts_Customer_Vendor__c , "Yes"),1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Strategic_Goal__c , "Yes"),1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Usability_Enhancement__c , "Yes"),1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Compliance__c , "Yes"),1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Scalability__c , "Yes"),1, 0)
CustomField.label: Total Points
